fallbackNotice: 目前暫以英文內容呈現，完整翻譯即將補上。
name: Partner-in-Residence
title: Transition Support Coach
bio: Our Partner-in-Residence supports spouses, carers, and loved ones who relocate alongside sustainability leaders.
They specialise in pacing big moves, negotiating shared care plans, and holding space for identity shifts.
Sessions weave multilingual coaching, practical planning, and restorative rituals for the whole household.
focus: Rebuilding identity and networks after relocation
Designing shared agreements that balance caregiving and career transitions
Creating multilingual rituals that keep families grounded during rapid change
credentials: Former community organiser across Taiwan and the UK
